content: rainbow keychain pattern materials abbreviations six colors of yarn single_crochet = single_crochet a keyring increase = increase stitch 4mm crochet hook st = stitch scissors round = round tapestry needle numbers in parenthesis are how many stitches are in that round start in purple round 1 6 single_crochet in ml 6 color change to blue round 2 increase x 6 increase into the first st of round 1 13 color change to green round 3 single_crochet increase all around increase into the first st of round 2 20 color change to yellow round 4 2 single_crochet increase all around increase into the first st of round 3 27 color change to orange round 5 3 single_crochet increase all around increase into the first st of round 4 34 round 6 1 invisible fasten_off orange yarn 2 fold the piece in half i cut the loose ends shorter on mine it should look like a rainbow-colored taco 3 make a slip knot with red yarn on your hook and insert the hook into the two stitches next to each other 4 single_crochet all along the edge of the piece 5 fasten_off and hide ends 6 optional insert a key ring under the topmost stitch on round 6 fastening off tutorial 1 cut the end of orange yarn close to the yarn ball 2 thread a tapestry needle onto orange yarn tail 3 skip 1 st and insert needle into the loop closest to you of the second st on the edge of the piece 4 insert needle into the loop furthest away from you of the last st of round 5 5 pull gently until the fake st is the same size as the other sts thank you for making this project i hope you enjoyed it pattern and photos by lucymakescrafts on ravelry
